00095 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8 && SIZEOF_INT == 4
00096 #define lqHash(key,shift) \
00097 (((unsigned)(unsigned long)(key) * DD_P1) >> (shift))
00098 #else
00099 #define lqHash(key,shift) \
00100 (((unsigned)(key) * DD_P1) >> (shift))
00101 #endif

00139 DdLevelQueue *
00140 cuddLevelQueueInit(
00141   int  levels /* number of levels */,
00142   int  itemSize /* size of the item */,
00143   int  numBuckets /* initial number of hash buckets */)
00144 {
00145     DdLevelQueue *queue;
00146     int logSize;
00147 
00148     queue = ALLOC(DdLevelQueue,1);
00149     if (queue == NULL)
00150         return(NULL);
00151 #ifdef __osf__
00152 #pragma pointer_size save
00153 #pragma pointer_size short
00154 #endif
00155     /* Keep pointers to the insertion points for all levels. */
00156     queue->last = ALLOC(DdQueueItem *, levels);
00157 #ifdef __osf__
00158 #pragma pointer_size restore
00159 #endif
00160     if (queue->last == NULL) {
00161         FREE(queue);
00162         return(NULL);
00163     }
00164     /* Use a hash table to test for uniqueness. */
00165     if (numBuckets < 2) numBuckets = 2;
00166     logSize = cuddComputeFloorLog2(numBuckets);
00167     queue->numBuckets = 1 << logSize;
00168     queue->shift = sizeof(int) * 8 - logSize;
00169 #ifdef __osf__
00170 #pragma pointer_size save
00171 #pragma pointer_size short
00172 #endif
00173     queue->buckets = ALLOC(DdQueueItem *, queue->numBuckets);
00174 #ifdef __osf__
00175 #pragma pointer_size restore
00176 #endif
00177     if (queue->buckets == NULL) {
00178         FREE(queue->last);
00179         FREE(queue);
00180         return(NULL);
00181     }
00182 #ifdef __osf__
00183 #pragma pointer_size save
00184 #pragma pointer_size short
00185 #endif
00186     memset(queue->last, 0, levels * sizeof(DdQueueItem *));
00187     memset(queue->buckets, 0, queue->numBuckets * sizeof(DdQueueItem *));
00188 #ifdef __osf__
00189 #pragma pointer_size restore
00190 #endif
00191     queue->first = NULL;
00192     queue->freelist = NULL;
00193     queue->levels = levels;
00194     queue->itemsize = itemSize;
00195     queue->size = 0;
00196     queue->maxsize = queue->numBuckets * DD_MAX_SUBTABLE_DENSITY;
00197     return(queue);
00198 
00199 } /* end of cuddLevelQueueInit */

00214 void
00215 cuddLevelQueueQuit(
00216   DdLevelQueue * queue)
00217 {
00218     DdQueueItem *item;
00219 
00220     while (queue->freelist != NULL) {
00221         item = queue->freelist;
00222         queue->freelist = item->next;
00223         FREE(item);
00224     }
00225     while (queue->first != NULL) {
00226         item = (DdQueueItem *) queue->first;
00227         queue->first = item->next;
00228         FREE(item);
00229     }
00230     FREE(queue->buckets);
00231     FREE(queue->last);
00232     FREE(queue);
00233     return;
00234 
00235 } /* end of cuddLevelQueueQuit */

00252 void *
00253 cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(
00254   DdLevelQueue * queue /* level queue */,
00255   void * key /* key to be enqueued */,
00256   int  level /* level at which to insert */)
00257 {
00258     int plevel;
00259     DdQueueItem *item;
00260 
00261 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00262     assert(level < queue->levels);
00263 #endif
00264     /* Check whether entry for this node exists. */
00265     item = hashLookup(queue,key);
00266     if (item != NULL) return(item);
00267 
00268     /* Get a free item from either the free list or the memory manager. */
00269     if (queue->freelist == NULL) {
00270         item = (DdQueueItem *) ALLOC(char, queue->itemsize);
00271         if (item == NULL)
00272             return(NULL);
00273     } else {
00274         item = queue->freelist;
00275         queue->freelist = item->next;
00276     }
00277     /* Initialize. */
00278     memset(item, 0, queue->itemsize);
00279     item->key = key;
00280     /* Update stats. */
00281     queue->size++;
00282 
00283     if (queue->last[level]) {
00284         /* There are already items for this level in the queue. */
00285         item->next = queue->last[level]->next;
00286         queue->last[level]->next = item;
00287     } else {
00288         /* There are no items at the current level.  Look for the first
00289         ** non-empty level preceeding this one. */
00290         plevel = level;
00291         while (plevel != 0 && queue->last[plevel] == NULL)
00292             plevel--;
00293         if (queue->last[plevel] == NULL) {
00294             /* No element precedes this one in the queue. */
00295             item->next = (DdQueueItem *) queue->first;
00296             queue->first = item;
00297         } else {
00298             item->next = queue->last[plevel]->next;
00299             queue->last[plevel]->next = item;
00300         }
00301     }
00302     queue->last[level] = item;
00303 
00304     /* Insert entry for the key in the hash table. */
00305     if (hashInsert(queue,item) == 0) {
00306         return(NULL);
00307     }
00308     return(item);
00309 
00310 } /* end of cuddLevelQueueEnqueue */
00311 
00312 
00324 void
00325 cuddLevelQueueDequeue(
00326   DdLevelQueue * queue,
00327   int  level)
00328 {
00329     DdQueueItem *item = (DdQueueItem *) queue->first;
00330 
00331     /* Delete from the hash table. */
00332     hashDelete(queue,item);
00333 
00334     /* Since we delete from the front, if this is the last item for
00335     ** its level, there are no other items for the same level. */
00336     if (queue->last[level] == item)
00337         queue->last[level] = NULL;
00338 
00339     queue->first = item->next;
00340     /* Put item on the free list. */
00341     item->next = queue->freelist;
00342     queue->freelist = item;
00343     /* Update stats. */
00344     queue->size--;
00345     return;
00346 
00347 } /* end of cuddLevelQueueDequeue */

00368 static DdQueueItem *
00369 hashLookup(
00370   DdLevelQueue * queue,
00371   void * key)
00372 {
00373     int posn;
00374     DdQueueItem *item;
00375 
00376     posn = lqHash(key,queue->shift);
00377     item = queue->buckets[posn];
00378 
00379     while (item != NULL) {
00380         if (item->key == key) {
00381             return(item);
00382         }
00383         item = item->cnext;
00384     }
00385     return(NULL);
00386 
00387 } /* end of hashLookup */
00388

00403 static int
00404 hashInsert(
00405   DdLevelQueue * queue,
00406   DdQueueItem * item)
00407 {
00408     int result;
00409     int posn;
00410 
00411     if (queue->size > queue->maxsize) {
00412         result = hashResize(queue);
00413         if (result == 0) return(0);
00414     }
00415 
00416     posn = lqHash(item->key,queue->shift);
00417     item->cnext = queue->buckets[posn];
00418     queue->buckets[posn] = item;
00419 
00420     return(1);
00421     
00422 } /* end of hashInsert */
00423 
00424 
00437 static void
00438 hashDelete(
00439   DdLevelQueue * queue,
00440   DdQueueItem * item)
00441 {
00442     int posn;
00443     DdQueueItem *prevItem;
00444 
00445     posn = lqHash(item->key,queue->shift);
00446     prevItem = queue->buckets[posn];
00447 
00448     if (prevItem == NULL) return;
00449     if (prevItem == item) {
00450         queue->buckets[posn] = prevItem->cnext;
00451         return;
00452     }
00453 
00454     while (prevItem->cnext != NULL) {
00455         if (prevItem->cnext == item) {
00456             prevItem->cnext = item->cnext;
00457             return;
00458         }
00459         prevItem = prevItem->cnext;
00460     }
00461     return;
00462 
00463 } /* end of hashDelete */

00478 static int
00479 hashResize(
00480   DdLevelQueue * queue)
00481 {
00482     int j;
00483     int posn;
00484     DdQueueItem *item;
00485     DdQueueItem *next;
00486     int numBuckets;
00487 #ifdef __osf__
00488 #pragma pointer_size save
00489 #pragma pointer_size short
00490 #endif
00491     DdQueueItem **buckets;
00492     DdQueueItem **oldBuckets = queue->buckets;
00493 #ifdef __osf__
00494 #pragma pointer_size restore
00495 #endif
00496     int shift;
00497     int oldNumBuckets = queue->numBuckets;
00498     extern void (*MMoutOfMemory)(long);
00499     void (*saveHandler)(long);
00500 
00501     /* Compute the new size of the subtable. */
00502     numBuckets = oldNumBuckets << 1;
00503     saveHandler = MMoutOfMemory;
00504     MMoutOfMemory = Cudd_OutOfMem;
00505 #ifdef __osf__
00506 #pragma pointer_size save
00507 #pragma pointer_size short
00508 #endif
00509     buckets = queue->buckets = ALLOC(DdQueueItem *, numBuckets);
00510     if (buckets == NULL) {
00511         queue->maxsize <<= 1;
00512         return(1);
00513     }
00514 
00515     queue->numBuckets = numBuckets;
00516     shift = --(queue->shift);
00517     queue->maxsize <<= 1;
00518     memset(buckets, 0, numBuckets * sizeof(DdQueueItem *));
00519 #ifdef __osf__
00520 #pragma pointer_size restore
00521 #endif
00522     for (j = 0; j < oldNumBuckets; j++) {
00523         item = oldBuckets[j];
00524         while (item != NULL) {
00525             next = item->cnext;
00526             posn = lqHash(item->key, shift);
00527             item->cnext = buckets[posn];
00528             buckets[posn] = item;
00529             item = next;
00530         }
00531     }
00532     FREE(oldBuckets);
00533     return(1);
00534 
00535 } /* end of hashResize */
